title: Check out our Favorite Cases for the Samsung Galaxy S22 series
content:
The Galaxy S22 series of smartphones is here and it is Samsung’s flagship lineup for 2022. The standard Galaxy S22 and Galaxy S22 Plus are catered towards an audience that wants a phone under the price of $1,000 whereas the big boy Galaxy S22 Ultra is for those who want a no-limits flagship. The post Check out our Favorite Cases for the Samsung Galaxy S22 series appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Here are some of our favorite Samsung Galaxy S22 cases if you want to protect your device and change the look of the back of the phones!
